Remote Sensing

Remote sensing involves acquiring information about Earthâ€™s surface using satellites, UAVs, and airborne sensors.

ğŸ›°ï¸ Types of Remote Sensing

1. Optical Remote Sensing

Visible, NIR, SWIR imaging.

2. Microwave Remote Sensing

SAR, radiometers.

3. Thermal Remote Sensing

Heat emissions, temperature mapping.

4. Hyperspectral

High-resolution spectral analysis.

5. LiDAR

Light detection for 3D terrain mapping.

ğŸ”— https://qgis.org

ğŸ”— https://github.com/rasterio/rasterio

ğŸ”— https://github.com/remotesensinginfo/rsgislib
